BASIC_DETAILS.CAPTION: This section contains basic information about the request that helps the learning team organize and track requests.

REQUEST_DETAILS.TITLE: Request Details
REQUEST_DETAILS.CAPTION: This section describes what the request is about.  Please make sure to include details that will help the learning team to better understand the goals and requirements so they can assess the request in a timely manner.

FIELDS.REQUEST_DESCRIPTION_PLACEHOLDER: Enter details of challenges you are trying to solve

L_D_SECTION.TITLE: Internal Information
L_D_SECTION.CAPTION: In this section the request owners can record the initial assessment results and will help the learning team make the decision on the request and plan for next steps if needed.

DEMAND_CAPACITY_AVAILABILITY.TOOLTIP: The 'Demand Vs Capacity Vs Availability' chart helps you achieve a balanced and productive workforce. Visualize workloads, team capacity, and availability over time to optimize resource allocation, Identify bottlenecks and make data-driven decisions.

ESTIMATION_BY_TASK_TYPE.TOOLTIP: This chart presents the median value for estimated and actual hours of the selected task type. Estimations are calculated from all open tasks within the chosen timeframe. The median reflects the central tendency in the data set, indicating the middle point when ordered from least to greatest.

LANDING.INTAKE_DESC: Intake, review, rank & respond to new training requests from across the business.
LANDING.DESIGN_DESC: Collaborate on strategies and techniques for developing and delivering learning.
LANDING.TEAMS_DESC: Manage teams and examine capacity on an ongoing basis to ensure resource availability for projects.
LANDING.PROJECTS_DESC: Outline and track the cost, scope, schedule and resources required for learning projects
LANDING.INSIGHTS_DESC: Unlock learning operations insights to discover and clarify strategic focus.
LANDING.SETTINGS_DESC: Configure platform and administer its operation to support unique business needs and experience.

EXTERNAL_USERS.BODY_LINE_TWO: Leverage best practices to rapidly build learning content.

STEP_ONE.TAB: 1. Select moving or deletion of project(s)
STEP_ONE.DESCRIPTION: This program has projects linked to it. You can either move them to a new program, or delete those projects along with the program or unlink them and delete only the program now .
STEP_ONE.DELETED_PROJECTS_TEXT: The following {numberOfProjects, plural, =1 {project} other {projects}} ({numberOfProjects}) will be deleted:
STEP_ONE.UNLINKED_PROJECTS_TEXT: The following {numberOfProjects, plural, =1 {project} other {projects}} ({numberOfProjects}) will be unlinked:
STEP_ONE.MOVED_PROJECTS_TEXT: Select a program to move all projects to:

STEP_TWO.DESCRIPTION: Please enter the name of the program you are deleting:
STEP_TWO.PROGRAM_NAME_PLACEHOLDER: Enter the name of the program
STEP_TWO.DELETED_PROJECTS_TEXT: All {numberOfProjects} {numberOfProjects, plural, =1 {project} other {projects}} are being deleted with this program. This action is not reversible.
STEP_TWO.UNLINKED_PROJECTS_TEXT: All {numberOfProjects} {numberOfProjects, plural, =1 {project} other {projects}} are being unlinked and program will be deleted. This action is not reversible.
STEP_TWO.MOVED_PROJECTS_TEXT: All {numberOfProjects} {numberOfProjects, plural, =1 {project} other {projects}} are being moved to {newProgramTitle}. The new program owners will be notified. This action is not reversible.

TIPS.TITLE: Tips and Examples
TIPS.DESCRIPTION: The following tips and examples were developed as a part of the collaboration between Cognota and ROI Institute.
TIPS.ERROR_MESSAGE: Sorry, an error occurred and we couldn't laod the Tips and Examples page.
TIPS.ERROR_SUB: Please reload this page before you try again.

ROI_BOOTCAMP.TITLE: ROI Boot Camp presented by</br>ROI Institute®

CATEGORY_INSTRUCTIONS.APPLICATION: “Application” refers to how the knowledge and skills gained through this learning program should be applied. What behavior changes should this program influence?
CATEGORY_INSTRUCTIONS.LEARNING: What new skills and/or competencies should learners gain from this program?
CATEGORY_INSTRUCTIONS.REACTION: Your learners' experience is important. Engaged and satisfied learners are the foundation for a successful program. What reactions does this program need to elicit?
CATEGORY_INSTRUCTIONS.IMPACT: How should this program improve business measures? Each Impact objective will ideally create a monetary benefit for your business.
CATEGORY_INSTRUCTIONS.ROI: Set an ROI Objective to determine if the program has achieved the intended result.

ERROR.TITLE: Sorry, an error occurred and changes were not saved!
ERROR.MESSAGE: Please reload the page before you try to save again.

CATEGORY.UPDATE_ERROR_TITLE: Sorry, an error occurred and some changes may not have been saved!

OBJECTIVE.OBJECTIVE_NOT_MET_REASON_PLACEHOLDER: Describe why the objective wasn't met
OBJECTIVE.AT_END_OF_PROGRAM_PARTICIPANTS: At the end of this program, participants will be able to
OBJECTIVE.EDIT_OBJECTIVE_PLACEHOLDER: Learners should find this program relevant to their role and job duties.

MODAL.TITLE: Delete Objective

MODAL.IMPACE_LEVEL_MESSAGE: By deleting this objective, any corresponding monetary benefits will also be permanently deleted from the system.

ERROR.TITLE: Sorry, an error occurred and the objective wasn't deleted!

ADD_OBJECTIVE.TITLE: Add {category} Objective
ADD_OBJECTIVE.SUBTITLE_REACTION: Select from these popular reaction objectives and add them to your program. If you don’t see what you need, you can create a new objective.
ADD_OBJECTIVE.OBJECTIVES_SHOULD_BE: Objectives should be SMART: specific, measurable, actionable, relevant, and time bound.
ADD_OBJECTIVE.ADD_OBJECTIVE_FOR: Add your objective for this strategy level

OBJECTIVE.REPORT_RESULTS: How do you want to report the results for this objective?
OBJECTIVE.MEASURED_OTHER_SCALE: Was it measured using any other scale?

BENEFITS.TITLE: Benefits Calculator
BENEFITS.SUBTITLE: Enter the value of one unit of measure and then enter the change in performance of that measure during one month.
BENEFITS.UNIT_OF_MEASURE_SUBTITLE: What is your objective measuring? Example: New customers, absences, churn
BENEFITS.VALUE_OF_UNIT_TITLE: Value of One Unit of Measure (V)
BENEFITS.VALUE_OF_UNIT_TOOLTIP: How do I find this value?
BENEFITS.VALUE_OF_UNIT_SUBTITLE: This could be value add such as profit for one new customer or cost avoidance for reducing absences.
BENEFITS.VALUE_OF_UNIT_PLACEHOLDER: Add monetary value for unit of measure
BENEFITS.CHANGE_OF_PERFORMANCE_SUBTITLE: Example: Add the number of absences prevented per month.
BENEFITS.ANNUAL_MONETARY_BENEFITS_SUBTITLE: Annual change in performance (ΔP*12) multiplied by the value of the measure
BENEFITS.ERROR_MESSAGE_TITLE: Sorry, an error occurred and we couldn't laod the instructions file
BENEFITS.ERROR_MESSAGE_BODY: Please reload this page before you try again.

ADDITIONAL_BENEFITS.SECTION_DESCRIPTION: What other benefits were created by this program? These benefits can be monetary or intangible.

ADD_ADDITIONAL_BENEFIT_MODAL.TITLE: Add {category} Benefit
ADD_ADDITIONAL_BENEFIT_MODAL.BENEFIT_INPUT_PLACEHOLDER: Add your benefit for this strategy level

PROMPTS.OTHER: What other benefits were created by this program?
PROMPTS.SCOPE: Additional benefits can include: stress reduction, job satisfaction.

EVALUATION.TITLE: Evaluation Plan & Results
EVALUATION.SECTION_DESCRIPTION: Recommended methods for evaluating reaction include post-program questionnaire, test and/or interview.
EVALUATION.WARNING: Add objectives first to plan the corresponding evaluation.
EVALUATION.NO_OBJECTIVES_TITLE: There are no objectives to match this plan.
EVALUATION.NO_OBJECTIVES_DESCRIPTION: Consider adding new objectives and updating your evaluation plan.

BUSINESS_REQUEST_SECTION.TITLE: Business Request
BUSINESS_REQUEST_SECTION.SUBTITLE: Who is requesting this learning? When does the learning need to be delivered?
BUSINESS_REQUEST_SECTION.REQUESTS_LABEL: Find the business request related to this program
BUSINESS_REQUEST_SECTION.REQUESTS_PLACEHOLDER: Search by request name or number
BUSINESS_REQUEST_SECTION.ADDITIONAL_FIELDS_PROMPT: If the following fields were not addressed in your business request or if no request was linked, please fill out.
BUSINESS_REQUEST_SECTION.COMPLETION_DATE_SUBTITLE: When should the learning be completed?

PAYOFF_OPPORTUNITY.TITLE: Payoff Opportunity
PAYOFF_OPPORTUNITY.SUBTITLE: What is the problem or opportunity? What is the economic value of the opportunity?
PAYOFF_OPPORTUNITY.TOOLTIP: E.g. We are losing $1 million a month due to the disposal of perfectly good products.

BUSINESS_NEED.TITLE: Business Need
BUSINESS_NEED.SUBTITLE: What business measures, if improved, would indicate the problem or opportunity is being addressed?
BUSINESS_NEED.TOOLTIP: E.g. Length of stay, inventory overrun, overtime, employee turnover, customer churn

JOB_PERFORMANCE_NEED.TITLE: Job Performance Need
JOB_PERFORMANCE_NEED.SUBTITLE: What is happening or not happening on the job that is causing the business need?
JOB_PERFORMANCE_NEED.TOOLTIP: E.g. Supervisors are not having conversations with staff who fail to show up for work

LEARNING_NEED.TITLE: Learning Need
LEARNING_NEED.SUBTITLE: What knowledge, skill or information is needed in order to change what is happening or not happening?
LEARNING_NEED.TOOLTIP: E.g. Key performer needs to know how to protect and manage their time

PREFERENCE_NEED.TITLE: Preference Need
PREFERENCE_NEED.SUBTITLE: How best can this knowledge, skill or information be communicated so that change on the job occurs?
PREFERENCE_NEED.TOOLTIP: E.g. New reporting process introduced to key stakeholder during executive retreat

LEARNER_DETAIL_SECTION.SECTION_SUBTITLE: Who are the learners? What do they need to know and do?

NO_OF_LEARNERS.TITLE: No. of Learners
NO_OF_LEARNERS.SUBTITLE: How many learners are included in the audience?

OBJECTIVES_SETTING.EMPTY_STATE_CAPTION: Get started adding your ROI Objective

ADD_OBJECTIVE_MODAL.OBJECTIVE_FIELD_SUBTITLE: What ROI % should this program achieve?

OBJECTIVE_PAGE.OBJECTIVE_FIELD_SUBTITLE: The desired ROI % for this program is
OBJECTIVE_PAGE.ROI_OBJECTIVE_MODAL_TEXT: By deleting this objective, any related calculations will also be permanently deleted from the system.

PROGRAM_COSTS.TITLE: Program Costs
PROGRAM_COSTS.SUBTITLE: This captures the total costs of the program including both direct and indirect costs. across all stages of the program, providing value for your ROI Calculation.

COSTS_PAGE.HEADING_TITLE: Add the costs associated with this program
COSTS_PAGE.HEADING_SUBTITLE: Include all costs related to the evaluation strategy, instrument design, data collection and analysis, and reporting costs.
COSTS_PAGE.RESOURCE_COSTS_TOOLTIP_LINE_1: This cost is equal to the
COSTS_PAGE.RESOURCE_COSTS_TOOLTIP_LINE_2: number of team members x average hourly salary x total hours.

ROI_CALCULATOR.TITLE: ROI Calculator
ROI_CALCULATOR.SUBTITLE: Converts your monetary benefits and program costs into a benefit-cost ratio and ROI expressed as a percent.
